title: Sunrisers Hyderabad v Gujarat Titans - 19th Match
story_summary: Gujarat Titans won by 7 wickets against Sunrisers Hyderabad.
SRH scored 152/8 in 20 overs.
GT chased the target with 153/3 in 16.4 overs.
Mohammed Siraj was named Player of the Match for his bowling performance.
Shubman Gill remained not out and scored a fifty.
Washington Sundar contributed with 49 runs for GT.
Cummins took 1 wicket for 14 runs in 3 overs for SRH.

title: Rajasthan Royals v Punjab Kings - 18th Match
story_summary: Rajasthan Royals won by 50 runs against Punjab Kings.
RR scored 205/4 in 20 overs.
PBKS were all out on 155/9 in 20 overs.
Jofra Archer was named Player of the Match.
Sanju Samson lead RR to victory.
Shreyas Iyer captain of PBKS acknowledged the team's loss.
Parag contributed with the bat for RR.

title: Delhi Capitals v Chennai Super Kings - 17th Match
story_summary: Delhi Capitals won by 25 runs against Chennai Super Kings.
DC scored 183/6 in 20 overs.
CSK scored 158/5 in 20 overs.
KL Rahul was named Player of the Match.
Vijay Shankar remained not out with 69 for CSK.
Dhoni scored an unbeaten 30 off 36 deliveries for CSK.
Starc took crucial powerplay wickets.

title: New Zealand v Pakistan - 3rd ODI
story_summary: New Zealand won by 43 runs against Pakistan in the 3rd ODI.
NZ scored 264/8 in 42 overs (match reduced due to wet outfield).
PAK were all out for 221 in 40 overs.
Michael Bracewell was named Player of the Match.
Ben Sears was named Player of the Series.
Rhys Mariu and Michael Bracewell scored fifties for NZ.
Ben Sears bagged his second fifer in as many matches.
